Title: Holly Jolly Secrets Part I
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Kent Osborne, Somvilay Xayaphone, Mark Banker (story), Patrick McHale (story), Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Tom Kenny
Plot: In Finn and Jake's holiday special, the heroes come across a video diary of the Ice King's and attempt to decipher its secrets.
